sn47.42:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and the ending of the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
sn47.42:4.3: And what is the origin of the body?
sn47.42:4.5: When food ceases, the body ends.
sn47.42:4.8: Consciousness originates from name and form.
sn47.42:4.9: When name and form cease, the mind ends.
